title: 3 Quick Steps to Get Straw in Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

steps.title: Locate a General Goods Merchant.
steps.content: Locate a General Goods Merchant. You can find a merchant in almost every city in Skyrim. Here are a few you can visit [1] X Research source : Arnleif and Sons Trading Company in Markarth The Pawned Prawn in Riften Belethor's General Goods in Whiterun Bits and Pieces in Solitude Birna's Oddments in Winterhold Sadri's Used Wares in Windhelm

steps.title: Purchase straw.
steps.content: Purchase straw. Speak to the merchant to see their supply. Once their supply is depleted, it will take some time for them to restock again. Don't worryâ€”you can still visit other merchants to purchase their stock. Merchants also sell weapons and armor. This can help if there are a few difficult areas you still need to clear . Straw can be used to construct archery targets, apiaries (beehives), beds, trophies, and Child's Practice Dummy. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Wait 48 hours for merchants to restock.
steps.content: Wait 48 hours for merchants to restock. Merchants restock their supply every 48 hours (2 in-game days). You can choose to wait naturally if you have other things to do, such as leveling up , getting other house materials , or making money . If you need lots of straw quickly, you can Wait 24 hours twice, or rest in a bed. Be sure to fast travel away and back if the merchant stock doesn't refresh.
